channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Saturday Morning Gift Show
channel.desc: Start ticking off from your Christmas gifts list with this fun-packed morning show. You'll find everything from toys for all ages, glam beauty gifts and hi-tech gadgets - all at great prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Yankee Candle Christmas Special
channel.desc: Immerse your home in festive fragrances with Yankee Candle's Christmas Special. Discover seasonal scents and delightful home accessories to create a warm, inviting holiday atmosphere.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Garden & DIY Gifts
channel.desc: Find the perfect gifts for gardening and DIY fans, with tools and accessories to help with everything from fixing the roof to changing a lightbulb, it's all here.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas with Kelly Hoppen
channel.desc: Dress up your home for the festive season with luxurious designer home accents from the K by Kelly Hoppen collection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Andi Peters' Food Fest
channel.desc: Enjoy sumptuous and tasty delights from an array of our most-loved food brands, both old favourites and new discoveries, hosted by Andi Peters and Dale Franklin.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Festive Food
channel.desc: Set your Christmas table with a mouth-watering festive feast in this show, boasting a bounty of delicious wintery fare to tuck into. From special savouries to sweet treats, find it here.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Timeless Christmas Shop
channel.desc: Step into The Timeless Christmas Shop! Discover QVC's best festive products, from animated characters to fibre optics and sound-activated decor. Everything you need for a magical holiday season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Top Tech Gifts for Everyone
channel.desc: Discover our range of innovative hi-tech gifts, carefully selected to please the gadget-lover in your life.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Neom Wellbeing London
channel.desc: In this show, explore an array of products from Neom Wellbeing, combining fabulous fragrances with naturally-sourced ingredients to offer you luxury aromatherapy products for the body, bath and home.

channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas with Hisense

channel.title: The Tova Collection
channel.desc: Inspired by the glamour of the classic Hollywood era, The Tova Collection features glamorous jewellery recreated from Tova's own personal collection, plus romantic fragrances for men and women.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Better You
channel.desc: Looking for a boost? Better You offers innovative supplements that are easy to slot into your routine. Tune in and discover how Better You can help you thrive.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.title: Up to 50% Off Garden Sales
channel.desc: Up to 50% Off Garden Sales.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: In the Salon with SBC
channel.desc: SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique Spectacular
channel.desc: Find the perfect sparkle with this dazzling collection of Diamonique simulated diamonds. You can enjoy all the glamour and style of diamonds without the price tag.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Prai Beauty
channel.desc: Prai is a ginger-like root that has been harvested in the tropical forests of Thailand for more than 1000 years. This range of prestige skincare combines traditional wisdom with the latest technology.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies
channel.desc: Committed to quality, design and value for money, Hush Puppies have become a household name and offer a wide range of ladies' footwear styles to suit any outfit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Looking for fab fashion pieces in petite sizes? Dannii Minogue has you covered, plus we've got a host of fantastic Sale offers for you to discover too! Tune in and get shopping.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tweak'd By Nature Haircare
channel.desc: Discover revolutionary haircare formulas from Tweak'd using luxurious ingredients from around the world, including kauri amber resin from New Zealand, dhatelo oil from Nepal, and more.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.
